name: Tarnation
flavor_text: Welcome to hell on Earth… delivered at 250 feet per second!

frame.name: Rapid-Fire Frame
frame.description: Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Volatile Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's launch parameters are particularly stable.
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Increases blast radius
  •  Decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Confined Launch

perks.description:
This weapon is weighted for vertical recoil.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Countermass

perks.description:
This weapon's launch barrel is optimized for projectile speed.
  •  Greatly increases projectile speed
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases blast radius
perks.name: Hard Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's launch barrel is well-balanced.
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
  •  Slightly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Linear Compensator

perks.description:
This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Increases projectile speed
perks.name: Quick Launch

perks.description:
This barrel is broadly optimized for firing control.
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
perks.name: Smart Drift Control

perks.description: Grenades fired from this weapon have increased proximity detection but a decreased blast radius.
perks.name: Proximity Grenades

perks.description:
Grenades fired from this weapon do increased damage on direct hits.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Spike Grenades

perks.description:
Reduces weight for faster reloads.
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
  •  Decreases stability
perks.name: Alloy Casing

perks.description:
Heavy, high capacity drum.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Augmented Drum

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles are larger and travel faster.
  •  Increases blast radius
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
  •  Decreases magazine size
perks.name: High-Explosive Ordnance

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles are particularly light and quick.
  •  Increases projectile speed
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: High-Velocity Rounds

perks.description:
Grenades are smaller and more compact for easier reloading.
  •  Increases magazine size
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Decreases blast radius
perks.name: Mini Frags

perks.description: Grenades fired from this weapon attach on impact and detonate when enemies are in proximity.
perks.name: Sticky Grenades

perks.description: Automatically reloads the magazine and improves weapon handling when wounded—even when this weapon is stowed.
perks.name: Pulse Monitor

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.
perks.name: Field Prep

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for an improved duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.
perks.name: Ensemble

perks.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
perks.name: Quickdraw

perks.description: Reloading this weapon randomly overfills it from reserves.
perks.name: Clown Cartridge

perks.description: Substantially improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.
perks.name: Ensemble

perks.description: Reloading this weapon randomly overfills it from reserves to an improved degree.
perks.name: Clown Cartridge

perks.description: The blast radius of this weapon increases when surrounded by combatants.
perks.name: Danger Zone

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.
perks.name: Wellspring

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description:
The blast radius of this weapon increases when surrounded by combatants.
Base blast radius is also improved.
perks.name: Danger Zone

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon generate an improved amount of ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.
perks.name: Wellspring

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield for an improved duration.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.
perks.name: One for All

perks.description: Each final blow with this weapon creates an elemental damage explosion.
perks.name: Chain Reaction

perks.description: Defeating combatants with this weapon generates an improved small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for an improved duration.
perks.name: One for All

perks.description: Each final blow with this weapon creates an elemental damage explosion. Improves ammo reserves.
perks.name: Chain Reaction

perks.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.
perks.name: Psychohack
